content: > i am most comfortable when my feet are warm i sleep better knit better enjoy my coffee better and travel better with warm feet this little pair of socks helps me keep my feet warm and fashionable they are super stretchy and designed with a loose cuff so that they are comfortable enough to sleep in i keep a pair in my car my suitcase and my knitting bag they also make terrific last minute gifts i hope you enjoy them as much as i do **note** the yarn amounts provided are for the suggested elasticized yarns in a relaxed state if you are substituting another dk weight yarn non-elastic you will need approximately 150 yards for a pair of socks
